coreQueryPageProvider.name: FIND_PHRASEBOOKS_PP
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * from FVCategories where ecm:ancestorId=? and ecm:name='Phrase Books' and ecm:isVersion=0 and ecm:isTrashed=0

coreQueryPageProvider.name: FIND_PHRASEBOOKS_IN_PHRASEBOOK_PP
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * from FVCategory where ecm:ancestorId=? and ecm:isVersion=0 and ecm:isTrashed=0

coreQueryPageProvider.name: FIND_PHRASES_WITH_PHRASEBOOK_PP
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: select * from FVPhrase where fv-phrase:phrase_books = ? and ecm:isVersion=0 and ecm:isTrashed=0
